title: Player Essential Schema
description: Minimal player schema for simple lookups and basic operations. Use this for ID format checks, existence verification, and basic status queries. For complete player data, use schemas/entities/player.json

id.description: Player identifier in format 'type-index' (e.g., '1-11' for player type 1, index 11)

guildId.description: Guild ID if player is a member, empty string if not

planetId.description: Planet ID if player owns a planet, empty string if not

fleetId.description: Fleet ID if player owns a fleet, empty string if not

substationId.description: Substation ID if connected, empty string if not

halted.description: Whether player is halted (cannot perform actions)

structs:useCases: Check basic player status (halted, guild membership)
structs:whenToUse: Use this schema for simple operations that don't require full player data (grid attributes, inventory, power details, etc.)
structs:whenNotToUse: Don't use this schema if you need: power capacity/load, ore/fuel amounts, inventory details, grid attributes, or any detailed player state
